title: Tom Cruise's son Connor makes rare public appearance as pair board helicopter
text:

It is very rare that he doesn't manage to stay out of focus, but Connor Cruise seemed to be enjoying the high life as he jumped in a helicopter with his famous father .

The 24-year-old was in London with his dad Tom, 57, over the weekend.

The DJ has shunned the limelight to focus on his own career and it's not often the family are pictured together.

He wore a trendy Polo sweatshirt while the actor opted for a black hoodie and jeans.

Tom and then wife Nicole Kidman adopted Connor and his sister Isabella, 26, when they were together.

(Image: J.A. / BACKGRID)

(Image: J.A. / BACKGRID)

Connor hit the headlines last year after moving into a Scientology resort in Florida.

It is reported that his stay at Sandcastle came to an end in August.

He was then seen driving a luxury $50,000 Mustang sports car with bright yellow paintwork.

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: J.A. / BACKGRID)

Connor very much keeps a low-profile and has never done an interview despite numerous offers.

Nicole told WHO magazine last year that her children have "made the choice to be Scientologists and as a mother, it’s my job to love them".

The actress added: "Motherhood is about the journey. There are going to be incredible peaks and valleys, whether you are an adopting mother or a birth mother.

(Image: J.A. / BACKGRID)

(Image: J.A. / BACKGRID)

"What a child needs is love.

“It’s not about anything else other than, ‘I’m here to love and support you’.”

Tom also has daughter Suri, 13, with ex-wife Katie Holmes, but he has not been publicly seen with the teenager since 2013.
description: The 24-year-old DJ had reportedly checked into a Scientology resort in Florida but has been in London for a break
